fulltext:
TRUONG BAO LAM 
Hospitality Professional 
10-02-1981 
Male 
 0768850818 
 lamtruongbao@yahoo.com 
 Ho chi minh city 
BRIEF INTRODUCTION & CAREER OBJECTIVES 
⇨ I have been involved in hospitality industry for over 12 years. Therefore, I have relevant experience 
and competencies in resort & hotel filed. In addition my communication skill is my valuable asset in 
working and establishing relationship with partners, colleagues.  
⇨ My career goal is to become hospitality expert in order to provide excellent service to customer 
and my organization will benefit from it 
EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND AND TRAINING COURSES  
09/1999 – 09/2003  
University of Economics, Hochiminh city 
Major    : Business Administration 
Degree : Bachelor  
09/2011 – 10/2011 
Marinabay Sands, Singapore 
Training course : Up your service 
09/2009 
Star Cruises 
Training course : Crowd Management 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
04/2018 – 06/2019 
Resort World Sentosa (Singapore) 
Business development executive 
+ Hosting of guests, understand and attend to their needs, and gather feedback 
to ensure hospitality and service excellence. 
+ Maintain and strengthen guest relationships via telemarketing and organization 
of in-house activities. 
+ Keep abreast of all in-house programs, promotions and events in order to 
provide accurate and up-to-date information to guests. 
+ Maintain confidentiality and compliance with regulatory requirements, 
established policies, standard operating procedures, internal controls & service 
standards. 
+ 50% of duties relating to hotel site : use Opera system to do the following tasks 
: reservation, room booking, check-in, monitor payment, utilize voucher, extract 
reports, etc. 
+ Coordinate with F&B departments to arrange guest’s requests : menu, seats, 
special requirements, etc. 
+ Support the team to achieve the designated region performance. 
+ Ensure accuracy and time delivery of all reports. 
03/2017 – 03/2018 
Imperial Pacific Resort & Hotel (USA) 
Senior supervisor 
+ Oversee customers and employees in assigned area. 
+ Direct assignment of personnel. 
+ Respond to customer disputes arising during working hours. 
+ Play active role in training and development of personnel. 
+ Assumes duties of Shift Manager in his / her absence 
06/2015 – 06/2016  
Vinpearlland (Vietnam) 
Customer service manager 
+ Be responsible for operation of ticket office with over 20 staffs in top-quality 
amusement park for tourists and relaxing guests; 
+ Work with travel agents, check booking and payment accordingly; 
+ Make working schedule for staff and monitor their compliances; 
+ Co-work with internal departments, such as : sales, accountant, finance, 
security to make sure all documents, receipts are correct; 
+ Event preparation : coordinate with relevant parties to ensure all events go 
through smoothly; carry out the logistic work in pre-event stage; 
+ Control cost and budget that allocated to the department; 
+ Take care of guest, handle complaints effectively. Facilitate a good environment 
for guest’s enjoyment. 
+ The tasks of an office admin : prepare financial reports and send them to 
designated departments / persons. 
04/2010 – 10/2012 
Marina Bay Sands (Singapore) 
Supervisor 
+ Monitor staff, make sure (that) they follow company's procedure and policy; 
+ Update information on computer’s system as required; 
+ In case of dispute with guest, try to find mutual solution to maintain guest’s 
satisfaction.  
11/2004 – 03/2010  
Star Cruises (International cruising) 
Various positions (Supervisor, Manager, Scheduler) 
+ Manage staff during their working hours (assign duty, break time, etc.); 
+ Office duties is a part of my job : edit documents, write email, data storage, etc. 
+ The regular customer service duties, such as : welcome guests, communicate 
with guest and try to meet their demand as much as possible; 
+ In case of dispute, try to find mutual solution for customer without violation of 
company’s procedure and policy; 
+ Make the reports in accordance with company’s requirements. 
LEVEL OF FOREIGN LANGUAGE AND COMPUTER  
English :  
Excellent in 3 skills : Listening, Speaking, Writing – TOEIC 700 
Computer : 
Fluently using popular office software (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) 
Proficiently with hotel software (Smile, Opera) 
Ability of fast-typing 
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES 
Main skills:  
 Patient and calm in the stressful situation, tactful approaching to matter. 
 Skillful communication to solve problem and find solution. 
 Self-discipline to complete task within deadline and work under pressure. 
 Able to negotiate with contractor, partner  
Other skills:  
Flexibility, Organization, Willing-to-learn new thing, Easy-to-adapt  
REFERENCES 
 Stephan Vu :  
Manager @ Marina Bay Sands 
Cell phone : +6586290225 
Email : stephannevu@yahoo.com 
 Ms. Ha Bui :  
HR Manager @ Vinpearlland 
Email : buithiha@gmail.com 
 Ms. Ann :   
Marketing Manager @ Sentosa  
Cellphone : +6591187912 
Email : ann@gmail.com 
HOBBIES & INTERESTS 
+ Playing guitar 
+ Playing chess 
+ Swimming 
+ Making short clip and video presentation for entertainment and memory recording
